Text: REGerald I spoke with our lawyer Robert Clark and the following is his additions to your language Please let me know if it is acceptable If so please prepare executables and forward for signatures Thanks Art Avalos Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein this Section shall only allow for offset set off or recoupment between Company and Customer but not between Company and Customers PNM Gas Services division Original Message From Nemec Gerald mailtoGerald NRONcom Sent Wednesday November PM To Cc Perlingiere Debra Fuller Dave Ward Kim S Houston Subject Art Per our phone conversation attached is the revised language for Section of the Master Firm Agreement Please review and if acceptable we will prepare executables and forward for signature Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein this Section shall only allow for offset set off or recoupment between Company and Customer excluding Customers PNM Gas Services division This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Q Call OptionHi Kim hope youre doing well Just received comments from our Lawyers for your Master Enfolio Should I be speaking with you or someone else Also could you give me a quote of what a daily call for Q will be at the money for mmBtuday Thanks I really appreciate it Art Avalos

RE rd Quarter of year This is for physical gas for a monthly call at the money The Balloon Fest schedule is Oct th Wednesday evening through noon Friday Oct th Thanks Art Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Subject RE rd Quarter of year Art We can price this up for you but I have a couple of questions Is this physical or financial Is is a daily call or monthly call Would you like this priced at the money or or more out of the money I other words what do you want your cap to be Thanks Kim ps What is the schedule for the baloon fest the th th Im trying to work around some meetings etc Original Message From Avalos Art ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAvalosCArtCAAVALOSpnmEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday October PM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject rd Quarter of year Kim just for planning purposes what would it cost to have a call option for year and for rd quarter of for mmBtus per day from the San Juan basin Thanks Art Avalos This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Q Call OptionHi Kim How are you doing About the comments on the Enfolio I spoke with Dave Fuller yesterday he said to email him our comments I will do so and I will also cc you on them As far as the market we are getting ready to become a end user on the EPNG system So sometime in June will be doing business If you have some time this month or the next please feel free to visit to go over our plans Thanks for all of your help Art Avalos Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday November AM To Subject RE Q Call Option Art Just wondering about your comments to our Enfolio Thanks Kim ps What is going on in the market with you guys these days Original Message From Avalos Art ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject RE Q Call Option Thanks for the info and I will be sending you PNMs comments via email Thanks again Art Avalos Original Message From mailto File mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Subject RE Q Call Option Art An at the money Daily call option against first of the month index for gas at San Juan is for Q next year At the money monthly call options would be with a strike of A fixed price daily call option would be with a strike of Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Kim Original Message From Avalos Art ENRON Sent Monday October PM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject Q Call Option Hi Kim hope youre doing well Just received comments from our Lawyers for your Master Enfolio Should I be speaking with you or someone else Also could you give me a quote of what a daily call for Q will be at the money for mmBtuday Thanks I really appreciate it Art Avalos This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use PNM Wholesale Power Marketing comments on the Enfolio Cc houston Dave the following are PNMs Wholesale Power Marketings comments Please spell out Public Service Company of New Mexico Wholesale Power Marketing throughout the Enfolio Section should also include your customers recording equipment and tape as well Section iv apply to any Party should be capitalized Section last sentence Notify Party or its Affiliates Section please include the following sentence at the end Provided however that it is not the purpose of this Section to provide for or to permit the setoff of obligations by ENRON against Counterparty for obligations of the PNM Gas Services under contracts between ENRON and the PNM Gas Services or against the PNM Gas Services for the obligations of the Counterparty under this Master Agreement Section A first sentence and iii such New Tax is due remove comma Section Appendix Arbitration Disputes Procedures and Award Texas Law is being used Our proposal is a neutral state such as New York

RE Cost for Put OptionThanks Kim I really appreciate it Art Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Subject RE Cost for Put Option Art We have priced these at the money puts and they are kind of expensive For the monthly put Strike of premium would be For the Daily put the premium would be Let me know if you have any questions Prices might be lower tomarrow given the downturn since AGAs came out If you are willing to look at out of the money puts the price would be better as well Thanks Kim Original Message From Avalos Art ENRON Sent Wednesday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject Cost for Put Option Hi Kim Could you please give me an estimate for Q on the cost of a put option for mmBtuday daily and monthly from the San Juan Basin Thanks I really appreciate it Art Avalos This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
